channel.title: Put windows on top of Linux using Virtual Machines
channel.description:
If anyone did not know, you can put windows on top of Linux using Virtual Machines.
One of these tutorials should be helpful. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=183209 http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=380699
Before installing Windows, you may want to shrink down its size using nLite. For more information about that, read this topic. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,141420.msg1356295.html
~Ron
